# HKMetadataKeyAudioExposureLevel

**Global Variable**

The audio level associated with an audio event.

## Declaration

```swift
let HKMetadataKeyAudioExposureLevel: String
```

## Discussion

Use this key on audio exposure events. It takes an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantity] containing the audio level measured in [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit/decibelAWeightedSoundPressureLevel()] units.
title: HKMetadataKeyAudioExposureLevel
